categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic fleets

nodes.text: The Sixth Division was a naval division of the Rebel Fleet of the Alliance to Restore the Republic created in the aftermath of the Battle of Hoth in 3 ABY. The Sixth Division regrouped in the Mid Rim, but was tracked down and destroyed by Tarkin's Will, helmed by Commander Ellian Zahra of the Galactic Empire. The Sixth Division contained several starships, including a GR-75 medium transport.
